name: Vestibular Adaptation Drills
description: Microgravity conditioning routines blending vestibular resets, suit ops, and cognitive steadiness for long-duration crews.

cards.title: Omni-Axis Spin Ups
cards.description: Run multi-axis chair sequences with eyes-open and eyes-closed reps to recalibrate otolith response before EVA blocks.
cards.summaryText: Fast vestibular recovery keeps Guardians useful after every tumble.

cards.title: Suit Don/Doff Timed Drill
cards.description: Execute full restraint suit don/doff cycles while floating to reinforce muscle memory when gravity cues vanish.
bulletpoints: Use buddy system for cable checks
cards.summaryText: Suit drills in microgravity stop EVA timelines from drifting.

cards.title: Glove Dexterity Circuit
cards.description: Practice fine-motor tasks in pressurized gloves while body stabilized only with thigh straps.
cards.summaryText: Guardians maintain dexterity once gloves become the new baseline.

cards.title: Cognitive Drift Check
cards.description: Run dual-task mental math and spatial recall tests immediately after spin training to monitor cognitive drift.
cards.summaryText: Space sickness also hits cognitionâ€”track it like any other vital.

cards.title: Translation Pathways
cards.description: Navigate three-dimensional handrail courses blindfolded using only tactile cues and tether feedback.
bulletpoints: Switch between push and pull segments
cards.summaryText: Spatial awareness grows when you practice moving without vision cues.

cards.title: Respiratory Control Sets
cards.description: Alternate paced breathing and isometric brace drills to stabilize heart rate before high-workload EVA tasks.
cards.summaryText: Controlled breathing keeps vertigo from spiraling into panic.
